verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> sim set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei toward the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. against

וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> ve-'A-mar-ta, And say הָרֵי֙ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei Ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְ֠הוִה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD לֶהָרִ֨ים <S%H2022><s%> le-ha-Rim to the mountains וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <S%H1389><s%> ve-lag-ge-va-'ot and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <S%H650><s%> la-'a-fi-Kim to the rivers; וְלַגֵּאָיֹת ve-lag-ge-'a-yot כוְלַגֵּאָיֹ֗ות <S%H1516><s%> ve-lag-ge-'a-Yot, valley קהִנְנִ֨י <S%H2009><s%> hin-Ni Behold אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni Myself מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi Behold I [even] I will bring עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem and חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev, a sword וְאִבַּדְתִּ֖י <S%H6><s%> ve-'ib-bad-Ti upon you and I will destroy בָּמֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1116><s%> ba-Mo-tei-Chem. your high places

וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> ve-na-Sham-mu shall be desolate מִזְבְּח֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Cho-tei-Chem, And your altars וְנִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <S%H7665><s%> ve-nish-be-Ru shall be broken חַמָּֽנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H2553><s%> cham-ma-nei-Chem; and your images וְהִפַּלְתִּי֙ <S%H5307><s%> ve-hip-pal-Ti and I will cast down חַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2491><s%> chal-lei-Chem, your slain לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei [men] before גִּלּוּלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Chem. your idols

וְנָתַתִּ֗י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti, And I will lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פִּגְרֵי֙ <S%H6297><s%> pig-Rei the dead carcases בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Hem; their idols וְזֵרִיתִי֙ <S%H2219><s%> ve-ze-ri-Ti and I will scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַצְמ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6106><s%> atz-Mo-tei-Chem, your bones סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vot round about מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-cho-tei-Chem. your altars

בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מוֹשְׁב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4186><s%> mo-she-Vo-tei-Chem, In all your dwellingplaces הֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim the cities תֶּחֱרַ֔בְנָה <S%H2717><s%> te-che-Rav-nah, shall be laid waste וְהַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> ve-hab-ba-Mot and the high places תִּישָׁ֑מְנָה <S%H3456><s%> ti-Sha-me-nah; shall be desolate לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'An because of יֶחֶרְב֨וּ <S%H2717><s%> ye-cher-Vu may be laid waste וְיֶאְשְׁמ֜וּ <S%H816><s%> ve-ye'-she-Mu and made desolate מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-cho-tei-Chem, that your altars וְנִשְׁבְּר֤וּ <S%H7665><s%> ve-nish-be-Ru may be broken וְנִשְׁבְּתוּ֙ <S%H7673><s%> ve-nish-be-Tu and cease גִּלּ֣וּלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-Lu-lei-Chem, and your idols וְנִגְדְּעוּ֙ <S%H1438><s%> ve-nig-de-'U may be cut down חַמָּ֣נֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2553><s%> cham-Ma-nei-Chem, and your images וְנִמְח֖וּ <S%H4229><s%> ve-nim-Chu may be abolished מַעֲשֵׂיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-sei-Chem. and your works

וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> ve-na-Fal shall fall חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal And the slain בְּתֽוֹכְכֶ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> be-toch-Chem; in the midst וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem of you and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֗י <S%H3498><s%> ve-ho-tar-Ti, Yet will I leave a remnant בִּהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> bih-Yot will have לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem פְּלִ֥יטֵי <S%H6412><s%> pe-Li-tei that ye may have [some] that shall escape חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev the sword בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim; among the nations בְּהִזָּרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2219><s%> be-hiz-za-ro-tei-Chem when ye shall be scattered בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'a-ra-Tzot. through the countries

וְזָכְר֨וּ <S%H2142><s%> ve-za-che-Ru of you shall remember פְלִֽיטֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H6412><s%> fe-li-tei-Chem And they that escape אוֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> o-Ti, בַּגּוֹיִם֮ <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim me among the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to which נִשְׁבּוּ־ <S%H7617><s%> nish-bu- whither they shall be carried captives שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> sham in it אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher how נִשְׁבַּ֜רְתִּי <S%H7665><s%> nish-Bar-ti because I am broken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לִבָּ֣ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam heart הַזּוֹנֶ֗ה <S%H2181><s%> haz-zo-Neh, with their whorish אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which סָר֙ <S%H5493><s%> sar which hath departed מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai, and וְאֵת֙ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et and by עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Hem, from me and with their eyes הַזֹּנ֕וֹת <S%H2181><s%> haz-zo-Not which go a whoring אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Hem; their idols וְנָקֹ֙טּוּ֙ <S%H6962><s%> ve-na-Kot-tu and they shall lothe בִּפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> bif-nei-Hem, themselves אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- for הָֽרָעוֹת֙ <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ot for the evils אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su, which they have committed לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol for all תּוֹעֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-tei-Hem. in all their abominations

וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U And they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in חִנָּם֙ <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam in vain דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti, [and that] I have not said לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot that I would do לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah this evil הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. likewise פ Peh

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD הַכֵּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> hak-Keh Smite בְכַפְּךָ֜ <S%H3709><s%> ve-chap-pe-Cha with thine hand וּרְקַ֤ע <S%H7554><s%> u-re-Ka' and stamp בְּרַגְלְךָ֙ <S%H7272><s%> be-rag-le-Cha with thy foot וֶֽאֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> ve-'e-mor- and say אָ֔ח <S%H253><s%> 'Ach, Alas אֶ֛ל <S%H413><s%> 'el because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all תּוֹעֲב֥וֹת <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-Vot abominations רָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ra-'ot for all the evil בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אֲשֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher, which בַּחֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword בָּרָעָ֥ב <S%H7458><s%> ba-ra-'Av by the famine וּבַדֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> u-vad-De-ver and by the pestilence יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> yip-Po-lu. for they shall fall

הָרָח֞וֹק <S%H7350><s%> ha-ra-Chok He that is far off בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> bad-De-ver of the pestilence יָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut, shall die וְהַקָּרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> ve-hak-ka-rOv and he that is near בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword יִפּ֔וֹל <S%H5307><s%> yip-Pol, shall fall וְהַנִּשְׁאָר֙ <S%H7604><s%> ve-han-nish-'Ar and he that remaineth וְהַנָּצ֔וּר <S%H5341><s%> ve-han-na-Tzur, and is besieged בָּרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ba-ra-'Av by the famine יָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut; shall die וְכִלֵּיתִ֥י <S%H3615><s%> ve-chil-lei-Ti thus will I accomplish חֲמָתִ֖י <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Ti my fury בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem Then shall ye know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, that I [am] the LORD בִּֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> bih-Yot become חַלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H2491><s%> chal-lei-Hem, when their slain בְּתוֹךְ֙ <S%H8432><s%> be-toCh [men] shall be among גִּלּ֣וּלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-Lu-lei-Hem, their idols סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vot round about מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-cho-tei-Hem; their altars אֶל֩ <S%H413><s%> 'el on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every גִּבְעָ֨ה <S%H1389><s%> giv-'Ah hill רָמָ֜ה <S%H7311><s%> ra-Mah upon every high בְּכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei in all the tops הֶהָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim, of the mountains וְתַ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> ve-Ta-chat under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every עֵ֤ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz tree רַֽעֲנָן֙ <S%H7488><s%> ra-'a-Nan and under every green וְתַ֙חַת֙ <S%H8478><s%> ve-Ta-chat and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every אֵלָ֣ה <S%H424><s%> 'e-Lah oak עֲבֻתָּ֔ה <S%H5687><s%> 'a-vut-Tah, and under every thick מְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom, the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher they נָֽתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-nu- where they did offer שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham in it רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach, sweet לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol to all גִּלּוּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Hem. to all their idols

וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> ve-na-Ti-ti So will I stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di my hand עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, against וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti upon them and make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land שְׁמָמָ֤ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah desolate וּמְשַׁמָּה֙ <S%H4923><s%> u-me-sham-Mah yea more desolate מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-Bar than the wilderness דִּבְלָ֔תָה <S%H1689><s%> div-La-tah, toward Diblath בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מוֹשְׁבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4186><s%> mo-she-vo-tei-Hem; in all their habitations וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh
